A mụrụ Jules Lion (ihe dị ka afọ 1809-1866) na Paris ma gosipụta ya na Paris Salon tupu ọ kwaga United States n'afọ 1837. O mechara mepee ụlọ ọrụ daguerrotype na New Orleans n'afọ 1840 otu afọ mgbe e mepụtara usoro ahụ. N'ọnwa Maachị 14, afọ 1840, New Orleans Bee bipụtara ọkwa banyere ihe ngosi nke Lion's daguerreotypes na St
Charles Museum, ihe ngosi foto mbụ e dere ede na Louisiana.

Site n'afọ ndị  1970s ruo na mmalite narị afọ nke 21, a na-eche na Lion bụ onye Ojiị (a kpọtụrụ ya aha na ihe ngosi dị ka onye Afrịka-Amerịka mbụ na-ese foto), mana ndekọ ọnụ ọgụgụ ndị France nyochara n'afọ 2017 na-egosi na ọ bụ nwa nne na nna ndị Juu na German. Echiche nke ịbụ onye ojii sitere na ọtụtụ mbipụta nke akwụkwọ ndekọ obodo New Orleans n'afọ ndị 1850s nke gụnyere mkpụrụedemede "f.m.c." ("nwoke nwere onwe ya") n'akụkụ aha ya

Otú ọ dị, enweghị onye ọ bụla na-ahọpụta agbụrụ na akwụkwọ iwu na ihe ndekọ ndị ọzọ n'oge ndụ ya niile, na mwepụ ya na akụkọ ihe mere eme dị mkpa nke mmalite narị afọ nke 20 nke Louisiana nwere ndị na-acha ọcha (dịka, Nos Hommes et Notre Histoire, nke Rodolphe Desdunes), na-atụ aro na-ezighị ezi na ndekọ ahụ, ikekwe metụtara mmekọrịta ya na nwanyị nwere onwe ya na-acha n'oge ahụ.

Ọ bụ ezie na Lion na-ese ihe, isi ihe ọ lekwasịrị anya bụ usoro foto lithographed nke ndị Louisian a ma ama na ndị nwere njikọ na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke Louisiana, gụnyere John James Audubon na Andrew Jackson
Ọdụm kụziri nka na Mahadum Louisiana ma, n'oge ndụ ya, mepụtara mkpuchi egwu egwu Confederate.
